group_1.textCenter: (I've been trying to become an idol for over@two years. School's starting again soon...)
(But I've got nothing to show for it...)
(I haven't changed at all since I transferred@schools...)
(I should practice... Not like it will help@anything...)

group_1.narration: Whenever I was feeling sad, and got@depressed from overthinking things,@the girl who always cheered me up was...

group_1.textRight: Ikumiii!
I heard you were feeling down, so I've come@to get you!

group_1.textCenter: If you heard that, then just leave me@alone...

group_1.textRight: No way! That would make you even sadder!
Let's go shopping, to get your mind off it!

group_1.narration: Of course it was always Yumi.

group_1.textRight: [chara:800203:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]This is sooo cute! Look, Ikumi!

group_1.textLeft: It is... It's in my color, too.

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* You know your stuff, now.
You've learned so much about the kind of @cute that fits you.
You're working really hard!

group_1.textLeft: (That's true... It's not like I haven't done@anything at all...)

group_1.textRight: All right! To the next store!
Wow, we sure bought a lot today!

group_1.textLeft: I spent all of my allowance.

group_1.textRight: I was surprised I didn't see you at practice.@Is this your friend?
...Uhh... [chara:800101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:800101:cheek_0][chara:800101:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:800101:lipSynch_1]Oh! Is that you, Ikumi?!
No way! Sorry I didn't recognize you at@first!
You look really different now. You're even@cuter than before.
[chara:800203:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]*Giggle* See? People can tell!

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Have I changed that much?

group_1.textRight: Yeah! Your vibe's totally changed. I barely@recognized you.
You must be working hard towards achieving@your dream.
Oops! I'd better run. It was nice seeing you!@Bye!

group_1.narration: Yumi noticed changes in me when@I didn't even realize I'd changed.

group_1.textRight: Listen to me, Ikumi. I can tell.
I can tell that you're working really hard,@and that your efforts are paying off.

group_1.textLeft: But Yumi... Just working hard isn't good@enough...

group_1.textRight: That isn't true. You know why?

group_1.narration: Yumi knew how hard I worked up until now.@She understood me.

group_1.textRight: I was able to thrive because I'm in a really@supportive environment.
So if you find people who understood how@amazing you are...
Then, your star will shine bright.
I know there are people who can see how@far you've come.
You'll be fine once you find the right@opportunity! You're adorable, after all!

group_1.narration: She always accepted me for who I am.
Even if I was the only one failing,@she would never question her belief@that "Ikumi is the cutest girl in the world."
It was always Yumi, every time.

group_1.textLeft: You're right... I'm never ever gonna give up!

'Cuz it's not like me to sit around feeling@super-duper sorry for myself! [chara:305301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:305301:cheek_1][chara:305301:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:305301:lipSynch_1]Tee hee!

group_1.textRight: That's right! You'll be fine! Just give it a@bit more time!

group_1.narration: She inspired me to try again,@so I believed that not forming a@contract was the right thing to do.
Wouldn't you agree?@It'd betray Yumi's belief in me@if I became an idol by making a wish.
But looking back on it now,@maybe I should've given it more thought.
Why did Kyubey stop coming to see me,@after being so darn persistent before?
And... Why was Yumi so certain@that everything would be fine?

group_1.textCenter: (Okay! It's time to give myself a fresh@start!)

group_1.textLeft: Ikumi, please stay after class, I need to@speak with you.

group_1.textRight: [chara:305301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Eek!
Ooo, a super-special maid cafe?

group_1.narration: I really did get an opportunity not long@after that.
The school ran a maid cafe that@mainly featured stage performances.@It was perfect for people like me,@who hadn't yet found a place to shine,@to seize new opportunities.
Since it was a part-time job, I'd be@getting paid for performing, which@sort of meant I was a professional.
Also, people from the industry would come@as customers, so it could be my big break!

group_1.textRight: The customers would watch me perform?

group_1.textLeft: If you want to do it, I'll recommend you.@What do you think?

group_1.textRight: I... I'll do it! I'll be a maid!

group_1.textLeft: Excellent. I'll recommend you, and tell you@your interview time when I know it.

group_1.textRight: Yes, ma'am! Thank yooou!

group_1.textLeft: We don't see your type much these days.
You're kind of a retro stereotype... But I@don't think that's a bad thing.

group_1.textRight: Thank you sooo much!

group_1.narration: So that's how I... Whoopsies!@I'm sooo talking out of character AGAIN!@That's not my real self at all, 'kay?
Anyway! For the first time ever @ever ever, I finally found a place@where I could be an idol! Yay!

group_1.textCenter: This will be my first step toward becoming@an idol!
